CHAT.comment: MOT is upstairs with older sister and when she comes back downstairs she lies on the floor near the toys

u.a: Chi is lying on the living room floor on her stomach
nods her head and then hangs up phone
starts dialing the telephone and smiling at mother
sits up on rug and faces Mot holding a blue plate in one hand and the telephone to her ear with her other hand
Chi is looking around through toys to see what toy Mot is talking about
picks up necklace and throws it behind her
pours a cup of tea from tea pot into cups and places them on saucers
pours a cup and hands cup and saucer to Mot
points to plate in front of Mot
picks up plate and stirs kettle
puts on firehat and starts banging two blocks together
takes the blocks from Chi and makes a the letter T with them
makes straight line with the two blocks
moves so she's sitting with her back towards EXP
pointing to the hat on the rug
looking around to where Mot is pointing
sits up to help Chi find the hat
puts the hat on the right way
